text: læa meux brrda xongkar xan chad cæng khxng rea thuk xan kæ phwk khea læw brrda phu mi hwang thi ca phb rea k klaw wa than cng na ku rxa nxun cak ni ma hı rea hrux peliynpælng seiy cng klaw theid (muhammad) mi bangkhwr kæ chan thi ca peliynpælng doy phla kar cak taw chan chan ca mi ptibati tam wentæ sing thi thuk prathan ma hı kæ chan theanan thæcring chan klaw wa hak chan fafun phracea khxng chan læw ca di rab kar lngthosʹ nı wan xan ying hıy
